job_description:
Scoop of duties:
-  Help prepare initial cost estimates for projects and perform quantity takeoffs from drawings.
- Assist in preparing tender documents, such as the bill of quantities (BOQ), and raising queries on tender documents
- Help monitor project costs and assist in maintaining financial records and cost ledgers.
- Accompany senior surveyors on site visits to assess progress, materials, and ensure compliance with project specifications.
- Assist in measuring work completed on-site and help in the valuation of contractor claims and variations.
